mapper.update:
update jy_collection_resource
teacher_id=#{teacherId},
school_resouces_id=#{schoolResoucesId},
file_id=#{fileId},
name=#{name},
type=#{type},
url=#{url},
file_size=#{fileSize},
update_time=now(),
create_time=#{createTime}
where id=#{id}
